dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A red, dusty road in a mining town. A POLITICIAN (55) in a white shirt and pants who looks mo like a local hood, travels on top of a Jeep which has bee designed to look like a mythological chariot. The jeep mo through the market place. His 40 supporters are on 15 motorcycles bearing bandannas flags in his party color, yellow. They ride slowly in fro of the chariot shouting slogans.

dialogues.speaker: CHORUS
dialogues.text: Humara neta kaisa ho? Mangal Netam jaisa ho! Mangal Netam Zindabad! A couple of his supporters climb on the Jeep and garland He is already laden with a dozen garlands- all yellow marigolds. His supporters gesture at everyone to listen to him speak He addresses the crowd on a microphone.

dialogues.speaker: POLITICIAN
dialogues.text: (in mock anger) Mangal Netam aapke beech vote maangne nahi aaya hai. Mat do mujhe vote! Mat do! His supporters are silent. POLITICIAN (CONT’D) Woh log mujhe thekedar kehte hai. Mujhe? (calms down) Mujhe iss kshetra ka vikaas chahiye. Mera sapna hai ki har bacche ke daaye haath mein laptop aur baayein haath mein mobile ho. Aur woh log aapke aur vikaas ke beech ka kaanta hai. His supporters start cheering him to not give up. POLITICIAN (CONT’D) (thumps his chest) Magar yeh dharti ka poot aapke liye khada hai. Agar woh laal hai toh main kamaal hoon. Agar woh teer hai toh main top hoon. Isiliye main kehta hoon ki agar aap iss chetra ka vikaas chahte ho toh aapko pata hai ki aapko kya karna hai.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Politician and his cronies travel in a car. He talks his cellphone. In front of them, the road is blocked by a fallen tree. A soon as the driver realizes it, everyone in the car panic he tries to frantically turn the car. As the driver tries to take a sharp U turn, eight uniform naxals(4 men, 4 women), their faces covered come out of t woods with guns, mostly 303s. The driver and bodyguard run out of the car begging them spare him. Mangal is frozen. When he turns back he sees both the dri and his bodyguard running away. A naxal woman opens the car door. A man pulls Mangal out the car, on the ground below. The woman pumps two bullets into him with her 303. Very economical. PROLOGUE: IN POST (Give background of the situation) 2A

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ELECTION COMMISSION OFFICER, P K MISHRA (50) is conduc a workshop for 40 men and women. There’s an EVM on the ta

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: India ka election duniya hairan hokar dekhti hai. Tees hazar karod ka kharcha, chaurasi karod voter, nabbe lakh polling booth. Har baar Guinness Book mein hum apna pichla world record tod ke ek naya record banate hai. Humne saabit kar diya hai ki hamari sansad mein goonde bhale hi chun ke aa jaaye magar chunaav mein goonda gardi nahi kar sakte. Kyun? Kyunki hum aur aap, Election commission ke chunav adhikaari, aisa hone nahi dete...

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: Chunav tak zinda rahenge tab na. Mishra looks stunned. Some people laugh.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Kaun bola? Saamne aaiye? Silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Murga nahi banayenge bhai... Laughter. Mishra regains his composure.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Dekhiye kal ki ghatna ke baad darr lagna swabhawik hai... It is human nature. Yeh pradesh Maowaad se grast hai. Kal ki ghatna se unhone chunav boycott ka elan kiya hai. Boycott! (pause) Maowaadi hamare samvidhaan aur prajatantra ko nahi maante. Jo Mao ne Cheen mein kiya woh unhe yahan karna hai. Maoji ka kehna tha ki rajnaitik shakti bandook ki nali se behti hai. Wahan bahi hogi, yahan nahi bahegi. Naksaliyon ko koi hathiyaar agar mita sakta hai to woh hathiyaar hai yeh VOTING MACHINE. Samjhe? A lady officer raises her hand with trepidation. Mishra looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kya samjhe?

dialogues.speaker: LADY OFFICER
dialogues.text: Sir, chunavi hinsa hui to? Mishra is getting a bit exasperated.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Awwaal to hogi nahi. Hui bhi to hum aapko kuch nahi hone denge. Har polling booth sensitive nahi hota. Jo log samvedansheel ilaako mein jayenge, jaise Dandkaranya jungle, unko poora security cover milega. Aap sirf free and fair election pe focus kare. Chaliye bataiye Chapter 1 point number 1.2 kya hai? A KEEN TYPE PROBATIONER, KTP, raises his hand. Mishra poi to him.

dialogues.speaker: KTP
dialogues.text: Sir, Presiding officer ka polling booth ke 200 metre ke radius mein poora control hoga. Sabko uska aadesh man-na hoga. Mishra lifts the manual.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shabaash. Aap sabko bhi yeh manual ghot ke peena hai. Chunav ke din manual dekhne ki naubat nahi aani chahiye. Am I clear? An officer raises her hand.

dialogues.speaker: OFFICER 1
dialogues.text: Sir, agar polling booth pe Maowadiyon ka hamla hua to hum kya kare?

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Hero bilkul mat ban-na. Jo bole kar dena. Chup-chap voting machine de dena. Hum uss booth ka chunav radd kar ke re election karvaenge.

dialogues.speaker: OFFICER 2
dialogues.text: Sir, agar re election mein bhi upadrav hua to?

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: To phir re election.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aur sir, agar re election ke re election mein bhi gadbad hui to? Mishra is not impressed.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Kya naam hai aapka?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ji, Newton Kumar.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Newton?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Newton.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Woh apple wala Newton?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ji. Officers in the audience laugh.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Huh. Do ke baad kya aata hai?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Jee teen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Teen ke baad?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Jee char.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Good boy. Baith jao. The group laughs again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: P.K. Mishra sits alone at a table eating. Newton enters the restaurant/ canteen. When he spots Mish he walks to him.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya sir? Simple doubt tha. Mazak bana diya aapne.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Sawaal aise poochogey toh jawaab bhi aise hi milege. Accha chhodo. Newton tumhara asli naam hai?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ji.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Pitaji Physics padate hai? Newton looks at him askance.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Mera poochne se matlab tha ki ‘Newton’ naam kisne rakha.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ji, khud maine. Mishra looks surprised.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Kyun?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Actually mera naam Nutan tha. Nutan Kumar. Class mein sab chedte the. Isliye tenth board ke form pe maine Nu ko New aur Tan ko Ton kar diya.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Nu ka New aur Tan ka Ton? Wah. Nutan ka Newton. Wah wah!. Yaar tum to kalakaar nikle!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyun?

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Beta Newton naam bada bhari hai. (quoting Shakespeare) Greatness has been thrust upon you.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya sir... aap meri class le rahe ho?

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Len-den se bhi upar ki baatein hoti hain. Suno ab. Pata hai Newton ne duniya kaise badli?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sir padha hai. Gravity. Optics.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Itne saalon se aap Newton hain, asli baat toh pakad hi nahi paaye. Beta ek jhatke mein dharti aasmaan baraabar kar diya tha usne. Ab poochho kaise?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kaise?

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Hota kya tha ki purane zamane mein dharti ke alag aur aasman ke alag kanoon hotey the. Ek rule hota tha rajaon ke liye, ek rule hota tha hum jaison ke liye. Pata hai na?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ji sir.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Lekin ek hi zhatke mein Newton ne duniya ke totey uda diye. Nature ke aagey koi raja nahin, koi fakeer nahi. Sab ke liye ek hi kanoon, chahe chand pe jao, Amrika jao, ya kahin mat jao, inertia mein raho. Jab kudrat Ambani aur bhikari mein bhed bhaav nahi karti, toh hum kaun hote hain? Samjhe?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: (thinking deeply) Hmmm.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Kaunse department mein ho.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Abhi tak allocate nahi hua hoon. Probation par DM daftar mein hoon.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Phir election duty pe kaise ho?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Reserve mein hoon sir.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Twelfth man bhi zaroori hai. Jaise cricket-football mein. Maaza aa raha hai naukri mein?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Jee.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Bade bhari mann se Jee bol rahe ho.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ajeeb sa mahoul hai saare daftar ka. Koi nakhoon kat-ta hai, koi patte khelta hai, koi din bhar oonghta rehta hai... bina rishwat koi file khiskaane ko raazi nahi hai... Gharwale aur rishteydaar alag pareshaan karte hai. Jab bhi milte hain upar ki kamai kitni hai poochte hain...

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Dekho naya naya josh hai tum bhi seekh jaoge saal bhar mein. Shuru shuru mein sabko aise hi lagta hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sir, sirf paise kamane thhe toh call centre mein naukri karta. I want to make a difference.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Tumhara problem pata hai kya hai?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: (confrontational) Meri imaandaari?

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Yeh imaandari ka ghamand. Dekho Newton babu aap imaandaar hokar desh samaj kissi pe ehsaan nahi kar rahe hai. It is expected of you. Samjhe? Newton listens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Imaandaari se mann halka hota hai bandhu, bhaari nahi. Mat lo duniya ka load, sirf apna kaam karo. Desh ki pragati apne aap ho jaegi. Newton nods. Thinking deeply. Mishra waits for Newton to resurface. Newton gets up to leave.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bhains aur bureaucrat main kya farak hai jaante ho? Newton looks askance.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bhains gobar karne ki tankha nahi leti. Ab chalo. They laugh.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Itna saara gyan diya, paaon nahi chuogey? Newton smiles politely.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sir, main paaon nahi choota.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Aajkal ke launde toh humare jaise hi hai! Mishra laughs. Newton forces a smile.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Suno. Shaadi hui hai?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Nahi sir.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Soch samajh ke karna. Yeh bhi ek prakaar ka seb hai.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. TOWN SCAPE- DAY
dialogues.text: A bird's eye view of the town. INT. LILA’S HOUSE- EVENING Traditional “Arranged Marriage” match making scenario. Newton’s parents have taken him to see a girl. They sit on a wooden sofa with cushions. In front of the the girl’s father, brother and a 90 year old grandmother thick glasses. There’s some noticeable disparity between his family and his are far simpler. GIRL’S FATHER Bhopal ke aage to yeh kasba sa lagta hoga nai? NEWTON’S FATHER Jahan bachha khush rahe apne liye to wahi Bhopal hai. GIRL’S FATHER Yeh sahi kahi aapne. Retirement ka sukh to baccho ke saath hi hai. Waise bhaisahab aap lagte nahi saath ke. NEWTON’S FATHER Abhi to siraf tireppan poore hue hai. Naukri lagte hi yeh ladne laga, Karwa diya retire! GIRL’S FATHER Sakshat Shravan Kumar hai apna Nutan.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Jee Newton. Her Grandma passes a framed cloth that has a bulbous rose embroidered on it. Newton’s mother looks at the embroider with interest. GIRL’S GRANDMA Bachpan se hi shauk hai. GIRL’s FATHER Beta ab tumhare roomal kabhi nahi khoyenge. Na koi chori kar paega. Sab par yeh tumhare woh initials kar degi. NEWTON’S MOTHER Haan, rumaal toh iske bade khotey hai. Newton doesn’t know how to react. Newton’s parents begin admire the embroidery. Newton’s attention is drawn towards the stairs where he c see some movement. The girl, LILA, nubile and demure ente Draped in a nice saree, she is escorted by her mother, si in law and older sister as she holds a tray of tea cups a pakodas.  10. She places the food before Newton and his family and sits down quietly next to her mother. Her head is bowed. GIRL’S FATHER Pakode khao, beta Nootan.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Newton. GIRL’S FATHER Beta itni English to mujhe aati nahi. Newton is about to say something when- GIRL’S MOTHER Chai lo beta. Makhi baith jaegi. She signals Lila with her eyes. Lila picks up the cup of around which a fly is hovering and hands it to Newton. Wh Newton takes a sip, a film of cream sticks to his lips. He cleans it awkwardly. Newton looks at Lila who looks uncomfortable. GIRL’S FATHER Beta kuch poochna hai bitiya se? ya sab shaadi ke baad? The parents laugh. Newton nervously keeps the cup on the table. NEWTON’S FATHER Kadai dekh li, pakode kha liye ab baat karne ko hai kya? Newton angrily looks at his father. His mother catches on GIRL’S FATHER Poochne do na. M.Sc. hai. Hogi koi baat. Pooch beta pooch. Newton clears his throat. He looks at Lila who is looking the ground.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya shauk rakhti hain aap?

dialogues.speaker: LILA
dialogues.text: Jee pichhur jaane ka shauk hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sabse favourite kaunsi hai?

dialogues.speaker: LILA
dialogues.text: Jee Hum Aapke Hain Kaun.  11. Her parents nod with approval.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: College mein ho? Lila shakes her head. GIRL’S FATHER Badmasho ke adde mein apni beti ko main to nahi bhejunga. Naam padhai ka kaam saara number do ka.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: To aapne twelveth ke baad kya kiya?

dialogues.speaker: LILA
dialogues.text: Jee woh nauvi tak kiya. Newton looks at her father. He glares back.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kab?

dialogues.speaker: LILA
dialogues.text: Jee teen saal pehle? Newton looks like he is doing a mental calculation.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Uss hisaab se to matlab aap matlab... Aapki age kya hui?

dialogues.speaker: LEELA
dialogues.text: Jee. Saade solah. Newton gets up, frightfully.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ladki nabaalig hai. GIRL’S FATHER Beta ladki sasuraal mein badi ho yehi aacha hai. Newton looks at his father with anger as if asking: what you gotten me involved in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two cycle rickshaws- on one, sits Newton, and on the othe sit his parents. Whenever Newton's rickshaw goes slightly ahead, his fathe tells his rider to buck up.  NEWTON’S FATHER To ek-ded saal mein ho jaegi baalig. Tab kar lena shaadi. Sasur contractor, damad afsar. Retirement tak ghee mein dooba rahega.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Mujhe nahi doobna ghee mein. NEWTON’S MOTHER Aise nahi bolte babu. Motorcycle aur paanch lakh nagdi denge.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Main nahi loonga. NEWTON’S FATHER Tujhe de kaun raha hai. Main loonga. Saala baap pe masteri jhaadta hai. (to rider) Tez chala! NEWTON’S MOTHER Chhodo na aap bhi.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Mujhe graduate ladki chahiye. NEWTON’S FATHER Apni degree kam hai kya chaatne ko jo uski bhi chaatega?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Graduate mein kya burai hai? NEWTON’S FATHER Graduate ladki dabaegi teri maa ke pair? Sarkari naukari kya lag gayi tu khud ko jameendar samajne laga? Kal kahega thakur brahman ke ghar byah do? Apni patloon mein reh. Newton’s rickshaw driver suddenly speeds up.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Main kabhi shaadi nahi karunga. NEWTON’S FATHER Beta yeh Dilip Kumar wala lehja daftar mein chaprasi pe chalana. Woh darega. Main tera baap hoon. INT. NEWTON’S HOME- NIGHT THEME MUSIC. Marimba plays.  10 11 12 13. Modest government quarters. Freshly white washed two room apartment. The whole colony is asleep. Newton stands in the balcony and looks out. He looks disturbed.

dialogues.speaker: THEME MUSIC CONTINUES.
dialogues.text: Newton is running, early in the morning. He’s dressed in white T-shirt, tracks and wears simple sports shoes. He stops and does stretches.

dialogues.speaker: THEME MUSIC CONTINUES.
dialogues.text: Newton diligently does his work at his office, which is f of dusty files. His colleagues are huddled around a table and are watchin cricket match on a cell phone. INT. NEWTON’S HOME- NIGHT 11 THEME MUSIC CONTINUES. Newton’s father and mother are watching a soap outside on older TV set. They look slightly out of place even in thi modest setting. His bookshelf- books like “You Can Win”, “Humara Samvidha “My experiments with truth”, books by Premchand, Ghalib, Republic by Plato, Principia Mathematica (or TYBSc Maths Physics textbooks). On his table lies the “Manual of Protocols for Presiding Officers of Polling Booth”. He opens it. He bites into a crisp apple and chews slowly as he studie diagrams of how the Electronic Voting Machine is operated INT. NEWTON’S HOME- DAY 12 Newton is in front of a small mirror that’s placed on his table. He combs his hair neatly. Once it looks neat and orderly, he shakes his head and gets the hair do he sport THEME MUSIC ends.  13 14.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Around 150 men and women are huddled in groups of 3-4, checking their polling materials. They are all carrying handbags. Presiding officers huddle around two large white-clothed tables with Table 1 officials giving them the EVMs and go over instructions and at Table 2, the Collector informing them about their polling booth. KTP stands in queue at Ta 1. Newton and a few other ‘Reserve’ officers are sitting a f feet away on a long bench. Some officers are on their pho some stare at the proceedings vacantly. Newton watches with the concentration of a benched player Table 1:

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: Kamal Kishore!

dialogues.speaker: KTP
dialogues.text: Yes sir! The COLLECTOR’s ASSOCIATE (local man in his 50's) looks a KTP and ticks his name in his list. He opens a plastic briefcase with the EVM. He hands over some papers in a file.

dialogues.speaker: COLLECTOR'S ASSOCIATE
dialogues.text: Check kariye.

dialogues.speaker: KTP
dialogues.text: Yes sir.

dialogues.speaker: COLLECTOR'S ASSOCIATE
dialogues.text: Control Unit aur Balloting Unit. He points to a smaller envelope. COLLECTOR'S ASSOCIATE (CONT’D) Isme kya hai jaante hain?

dialogues.speaker: KTP
dialogues.text: Yes sir. Iss mein hai hari seal, strip seal, stamp pad, form 17A, Form 17 C, statutory forms, aur syahi vagerah. The officer is impressed.

dialogues.speaker: COLLECTOR'S ASSOCIATE
dialogues.text: Very good. Ab EVM check kare.  15. KTP connects the Control Unit and the Balloting Unit. He switches on the machine and checks whether it is working.

dialogues.speaker: COLLECTOR'S ASSOCIATE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jaiye assign ho jaiye.

dialogues.speaker: KTP
dialogues.text: Sir! KTP walks to the other table where the collector sits wit her assistant.

dialogues.speaker: COLLECTOR'S PA
dialogues.text: (looking into the file) Kamal Kishore? Aapka booth 237 hai.

dialogues.speaker: KTP
dialogues.text: Jee Madam. Collector looks up.

dialogues.speaker: COLLECTOR
dialogues.text: Chhota booth hai. Sirf 76 voters.

dialogues.speaker: KTP
dialogues.text: Madam Gir jungle mein to ek voter ke liye bhi booth bana tha.

dialogues.speaker: COLLECTOR
dialogues.text: I know. Yeh Gir mein nahi Dandkaranya mein hai. Yahan dekho. KTP’s face turns pale. His countenance betrays fright.

dialogues.speaker: KTP
dialogues.text: Jee Jungle mein? On a map the Collector points to the booth.

dialogues.speaker: COLLECTOR
dialogues.text: Haan. Yahan. Maoist influence kaafi heavy hai, lekin che mahine se poora control administration ke paas hai. Full security milegi. Aapke saath do sahayak jayenge, aur ek BLO bhi hai waha madad ke liye. Aap abhi helicopter se jayenge. KTP moves closer to the Collector and speaks softly.

dialogues.speaker: KTP
dialogues.text: Mujhe toh City Hall bataya gaya tha.

dialogues.speaker: KTP
dialogues.text: Bansilal ji ne.

dialogues.speaker: COLLECTOR
dialogues.text: List main banati hoon, Bansilal nahi.

dialogues.speaker: KTP
dialogues.text: Mujhse ho nahi paega madam. Please Madam. Meri nayi nayi shaadi hui hai. Wife expect kar rahi hai. Main heart patient hoon. Main jungle mein nahi jaunga. Please please! Insert: Newton is suddenly paying complete attention to what is happening at the collector’s table. Back to table:

dialogues.speaker: KTP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Suspend kar dijiye. FIR kar dijiye. Magar wahan mat bhejiye. Please. The collector looks at KTP with disdain.

dialogues.speaker: COLLECTOR
dialogues.text: Medical certificate hai?

dialogues.speaker: KTP
dialogues.text: Ek ghante mein le aunga. Collector waves him away with utter disdain. He darts off She looks at her PA.

dialogues.speaker: COLLECTOR
dialogues.text: Reserve mein se koi jaega?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The jungle is seen from the helicopter pilot’s cockpit. F the window, Newton watches the terrain below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOUD SOUND of a helicopter landing on a helipad on a fore hillock. Dust-storm is created as the fan settles. The door is opened. Newton comes out. Behind him, LOKNATH (57) alights, followed by SHAMBHU (30). Between the three they hold the EVM boxes, files and polling material.  17. Newton squints his eyes in the dust and looks around. Unmarked vehicles belonging to the Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) are waiting for them. There are about a doze CRPF constables with guns. The Sub Inspector, KRISHNA SINGH (32) comes towards Newto Newton shakes his hand.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Jai Hind Newton Sir. Sub Inspector Krishna Singh. We can’t hear their voices because of the helicopter’s no

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Election party ke baki log kahan hai?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sirf hum teen hai.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Vanvaas pe. Krishna smiles and nods his head. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Ab yahan se kitna?

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Ghante bhar mein pahuch jayenge. Sir, yeh laga lijiye. He passes a tube of mosquito repellent.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Theek se mal lijiye. Iss ilaake mey log goliyon se kum aur malaria se zyada marte hai. Newton, Shambhu, and Loknath rub it on to their hands and faces as they approach their parked jeep.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ROP kaam pe hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aropi? Aropi kaun hai?

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: R.O.P. Road Opening Party. Raaste mein mines vagerah clear karne. Dariye mat. Ambush ka chance bahut kam hai.  17 18 19 20 18.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Kitna kam?

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Dus percent. Loknath gets a coughing fit on hearing it. Shambhu looks like he doing some mental calculation.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (laughs) Ghabrao nahi! Iss area ke hisaab se dus percent kuch nahi hai. As they get into the jeep, Newton asks.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yeh ‘dus percent’ calculate kaise karte hai?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four jeeps go in a straight file on the highway that pass through the jungle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROP is seen from the windshield. The police radio buzzes constantly- reporting from variou outposts in the jungle. The sounds are muffled.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Picchle chunav mein yahan kehte hai unnees log mare gaye the.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Figure sahi hai. Magar sirf yahan nahi. Poore pradesh mein. Yahan to matdaan kendra aaj kai saal baad laga hai. Yahan ki casualty figure aaj shaam pata chalegi. Newton, Loknath and Shambhu look perturbed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun is setting behind the hills in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An orange plastic flying Hanuman hangs on the rear view mirror.  19.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: (points in the distance) Sir, woh pahad dekh rahe hai? A hillock in the distance glistens like a ghost.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya hai wahan?

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Pakistan! Newton looks at him with disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER
dialogues.text: Pichle August tak wahan lal jhande ko salaami di jaati thi.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: (laughing) Meri toh abhi tak jahan bhi posting hui hai na, log alag alag jhandon ko salami dete hai.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Jhande aur dande se hi toh desh banta hai!

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yeh naxali area ko Pakistan kyon kehte hai?

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Bhagwan jaane sahab. Mere aane se pehle se kehte hai. Dushman meaning Pakistan.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yeh saara area unke paas tha?

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Ab humare control mein hai. Phir bhi khatra to hota hi hai. Jageh jageh mines bichi milti hai. (laughing) Aap log yahan wahan pishaab karte samay savdhaan rehna. Galat jageh moot diya to kaand ho jaega.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four jeeps travel. Car headlights are on.  20.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The four jeeps turn. The light falls on a BLOWN UP JEEP, the road.

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER, (VOICE)
dialogues.text: Isi spot pe ambush hua tha. Sau dedh-sau honge unki toli mein. Aadmi aurat sab saath mein chaaron taraf se firing kar rahe the. Aur dus minute mein sab ke sab jungle mein gaayab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton and Loknath look at the blown up jeep.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yahan? The driver shows his left arm as he continues driving. Ve little is seen in that light.

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER
dialogues.text: Choo ke dekho. Bum ka tukda abhi tak andar dhasa hua hai. Loknath touches it reluctantly.

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Feel kar sakte ho na? (to Newton) Aap bhi dekho. Newton touches the hand.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Tagda ghaav hai.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Commandant sahab ko to yeh kharoch lagti hai. Medal ke liye NDE maangte hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: NDE matlab?

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Near Death Experience.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The convoy enters the CRPF camp. Barbed wire at the wall. Sandbags with gunners behind it. A sentry opens the gate.  21.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Aa gaya London.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Bhaiya mujhe to neend aane se rahi.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Dariye mat. Yahan ekdum safe hai.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Kitna percent safe? Krishna laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small group is huddled outside a tent playing carrom. Newton, Loknath and Shambhu watch this from their tent do

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton sleeps. Suddenly, there’s light on Newton’s face. Newton opens his eyes and sits up. A Gondi man is shining light. He is LAKHMA. Torch light on Newton’s face. His eyes open and he sits u Lakhma puts the torch light on his own face.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Ghabrao nahi, main Lakhma hoon...

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya time hua? Sab log kahan hai. He checks his watch for the time.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sade paanch baje gaye. Hum late ho jayenge.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: So jaiye Sirji. Sahab abhi abhi aaye hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aa gaye? Loknath! Shambhu!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton, Loknath and Shambhu walk towards Atma Singh who i scolding a constable. They wait till he is done.  28 22. Atma Singh turns and offers his hand to Loknath.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Jai Hind Kumar Sir. Atma Singh Assistant Commandant. Loknath, who looks taken by Atma Singh’s personality mere shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ji, main hoon. (takes his hand) Newton Kumar, Upper Division Clerk, Collector Office. Yeh Loknath hai. Atma Singh checks Newton out from top to bottom as if re- checking if the EC had indeed sent such a young officer.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Naam bahut adbhut hai hai aapka. Newton. Kisne diya?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: (stern, no nonsense) Ji maine. Atma Singh gets the hint and stops smiling.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Yehi hai aapki polling party?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ek BLO yahan join karega.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: BLO? Bhai, yahan local logon ka koi bharosa nahi hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Nahi mujhe Collector madam ne khud bola tha ki...

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: (cuts in) Anda khate ho? Newton is startled. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Egg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A table is set with breakfast of boiled eggs and bread. T are sitting around the table. Loknath picks one up an egg and checks it out.  23.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Jungli anda hai. Yahan ki murgiyaan bhi krantikaari hai. Ghanta bhar interrogate kiya tab diya anda. Laughter from everyone. Lakhma pours red tea in three chai glasses. Atma takes out a small bottle and pours some whiskey in h tea. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Lenge? Himmat ki dawai hai. Newton shakes his head. Loknath looks at the booze with desire. Newton starts eating. Atma Singh doesn’t like Newton’s attitude.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Polling booth kitni door hai?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: (politely) Woh aap mujh pe chhod do. Yahan tak aa gaye bahut hai. Aage safe nahi hai. Vote andar jakar mere aadmi le aayenge. Aap tension mat lo.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Madam ne to bataya tha ki yahan cheh mahine se kuch nahi hua hai.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: To hum yahan chor police kyon khel rahe hain? Dekho disturbed area mein chunav aise hi hota hai. Kashmir aur Manipur mein maine khud karaya hain.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Lekin yahan presiding officer main hoon. Newton pulls out his map.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jis school mein booth hai woh kuch aath kilometer door hai.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Ekdum correct information hai aapki. Wahi se mere aadmi vote layenge.  29 30 24.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Aapka ilaaka hai. Jaise aap kahe. Newton cuts Loknath.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Loknath ji. Please. (to Atma) Humein apni duty karni hai.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Newton ji, inn logon ko kuch nahi padi election ki. Upar se boycott ka elan hua hai. Main likh ke deta hoon koi nahi ayega.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Theek hai phir likh ke dijiye.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aap jo bhi keh rahe ho, writing mey dijiye. Main usse apne collector ko forward kar doonga. Atma Singh is stunned. Long silence. Atma Singh stares in Newton eyes. Newton looks here and there, not wanting to stare back. Finally Atma Singh turns.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Rajendra! BP jacket nikalo! Newton and Loknath look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lights from torches. Newton, Loknath and Shambhu are being helped into their v by constables. Atma Singh comes to Newton and tightens hi vest like a corset. Newton gasps for breath.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: (under his breath) Sarkari maal hai. Kaske na baandho to goli paar nikal hi jaati hai. He barks instructions on the walkie.

dialogues.speaker: 30B
dialogues.text: 31 25. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Alpha to Alpha 4.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE ON WALKIE
dialogues.text: Alpha 4 here. Aadesh kare.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Point 44 pe area domination kar ke khabar karo.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE ON WALKIE
dialogues.text: Janaab. Jai hind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a wide shot, forty men are walking. Only their torch lights are seen. Murmurs are heard. One by one, torches are switched off.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: Ab ullu bano ullu! Zinda rehna hai toh andhere mein dekhna seekho. Others hush him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The first rays of the rising sun. The jungle wakes up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group walks in a V formation. As they walk towards the jungle, they see a lady walking towards them. The men get alarmed. Rajendra and two constables walk in her direction.

dialogues.speaker: RAJENDRA
dialogues.text: Ruko! Kaun ho?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Main Priya hoon. BLO. Newton wants to go to her but Atma Singh stops him.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: ID dekho. She fishes it out of her bag. Atma Singh walks towards he Newton follows him. Rajendra checks it.  26. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Aap nahi chal sakti. Safe nahi hai. Priya looks confused. She looks at Newton askance.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kyun?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: (mumbles to Newton) Local logon se thoda bach ke rehna chahiye.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yeh election team main hai. Yeh jayengi. Atma Singh sizes up Newton.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Rajendra, bullet proof.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Nahi chahiye. Main local hoon. Yeh pehnungi toh zyada khatra hai. Newton is alarmed with her tone.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Mujhe bhi nahi chahiye yeh bulletproof.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Aap pehne raho. Aap local nahi ho. Priya walks to Newton.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Voter list hai aapke paas?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Updated hai na?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Jo hai wahi hai.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loknath walks with Lakhma.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Aaj baarish hogi?

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Ho sakti hai.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Magar aasmaan mein to ek bhi badal nahi hai.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Phir nahi hogi. Loknath looks at Lakhma strangely.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Ajeeb ho tum. After walking for some more time.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Yeh Shahrukh ka jo agla filam aa raha hai woh hit hogi kya?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Ho sakti hai.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Par uske pehle wali filam toh pitt gayi thi.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Phir nahi hogi. Lakhma’s cronies laugh at Loknath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PBS # 1 starts. Caravan of 40 men and Priya walk in the jungle in a formation. They are led by a local head constable and the SPOs who carry guns. Two men with mine detectors are in t front. Some men are carrying foldable tables, chairs, ten material. Newton and Priya hold a files. Loknath clutches EVM box. Shambhu is taking a selfie as he walks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MID SHOTS of Newton, Priya, Atma Singh, Loknath, SPO Lakh Krishna, Rajendra, constables walking through the path wh is flanked by thick bushes on both sides.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group crosses a dried up river bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Group walks up a hill. Krishna points out to an old tatte red rag- on the tree. It’s an old Maoist flag. Beneath it a graffiti written on the tree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atma Singh walks a few paces behind Newton, observing him Suddenly a snap is heard and a branch falls a few meters ahead of them. PBS # 1 stops abruptly. All guns are pointed in different directions. Eerie silence. Atma Singh gestures at the polling officer duck.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: (whispers) Yeh-

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Shhhhh.... neeche neeche! Newton, Loknath and Priya sit down. They watch how Atma S and his party approach the branch. They check if it’s a b trap and then when they are sure, they cross the path and move ahead. PBS # 1 starts again. The group begins to walk ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They exit the thicker forest and come on a bushy plain. The group walks through another part of the thick jungle. couple of constables lip sync the song for a few seconds. PBS # 1 fades out. As the group walks, Loknath stops.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Sir. Jaana padega.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kahan?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Deerghshanka. Loknath gestures that he needs to answer nature’s call.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Wahan camp mein kyun nahi gaye?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Sir, mere karam phoote hai. Bina mehnat ki toh mujhe tatti bhi nahi aati.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: (mumbles ) Yeh election party hai ya Ramleela mandali, sab saale kalaakar jungle mein prakat hotey hai.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Halt! Krishna and others are gentle.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Chaliye, hum karwa dete hai. Everyone stops.

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: Everyone waits. Loknath is escorted by two constables and another one wit mine detector scans a bush and then gestures at Loknath t sit. He is mumbling a prayer under his breath. Loknath sits and then gestures at the men to give him privacy. The men stand on guard. Loknath starts singing. As they wait, Newton is silently contemplating. Atma Sing watching him. Loknath’s song is heard faintly. Priya drin water. Shambhu whispers to a constable.

dialogues.speaker: SHAMBHU
dialogues.text: Yeh bandook kaunsi hai?

dialogues.speaker: RAJENDRA
dialogues.text: Yeh bandook nahi hai. Shambhu has a goofy smile.

dialogues.speaker: SHAMBHU
dialogues.text: Phir kya hai yeh?  30.

dialogues.speaker: RAJENDRA
dialogues.text: Isse hum kabz ka ilaaj karte hai. Aap kahe toh aapka kara de? Shambhu stops smiling. Suddenly, four Gondi boys and girls in their late teens appear in the distance through the fog. They are covered black woolen blankets. They are stopped by SPOs.

dialogues.speaker: SPO JOGA
dialogues.text: (questions them in Gondi)

dialogues.speaker: GONDI YOUTH 1
dialogues.text: (replies in Gondi) Two other SPOs check them for arms.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Kya bata rahe hai? SPO Lakhma Tendu patta laane jaa rahe hai.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Sabke vote abhi le lo. Newton walks to them.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Voting ka procedure hota hai. Aise nahi. Inka ID card vagerah check karna hoga. Uske bina yeh vote nahi daal sakte.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Poocho hai ki nahi. SPO Joga and local constable DINU (35) SPEAK to the Gondi youth in Gondi.

dialogues.speaker: DINU/ SPO JOGA
dialogues.text: (speaks in Gondi)

dialogues.speaker: GONDI YOUTH 2
dialogues.text: (replies in Gondi) Priya and Newton are in earshot. Lakhma lets the four Gondi youngsters go and then turns t Atma Singh.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Ghar pe hai card inka. Kaam se ghar hokar card le ke phir aayenge.  31.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: (Looking at Newton) Good. Newton feels assured. Priya looks uncomfortable. Loknath walks back towards them, feeling jubilant.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Chalo sattar mein se char voter to aa gaye. Kam se kam paanch per cent turnout to hoga.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Aapka kitna percent turnout hua? Priya speaks up hesitantly.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Sir woh... woh shayad yeh log nahi aayenge. Unhe bola gaya hai ki matdaan kewal barah baje tak hoga. Newton looks at Atma Singh.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Atma Singh ji! Atma Singh turns.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Atma Singh ji aapke aadmi barah baje ka time bata rahe hai.... Newton looks in the distance towards the Gondi youth and calls out to them.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aye aye! Ruko. Priya jao aur batao hum yahan teen baje tak rehne wale hai. Aaram se kaam karke aa sakte hain. Priya walks towards the Gondis.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: (tells him in Gondi- “Please come by three in the afternoon.”)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They have walked a little ahead. After eyeing him for a while, Atma Singh turns to Newton.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Cricket khelte thhe bachpan mein?  32.

dialogues.speaker: -NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ji.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Batsman the ya Bowler?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Umpire.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Laga mujhe... yeh Naxaliyon ke baare mein aapke kya vichaar hai?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Mera koi vichaar nahi hai Sir, tabhi toh humein election karaane bheja hai. Atma Singh takes it as an affront.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Aap itne intelligent ho, IAS ki pareeksha kyun nahi di?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Di thi. Fail ho gaya.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Lagaa mujhe. Silence for some seconds. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Nagaland ka capital jaante ho?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kohima.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Manipur ka?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Imphal.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Aur Kashmir ka?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Srinagar.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Kabhi gaye ho?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Nahi.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Main gaya hoon.  327 33 33. He takes off his gun and hands it to Newton. Newton is pretty awkward with the gun. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Bhari hai na?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Haan.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Yeh desh ka bhar hai. Aur yeh mere kandho pe hai. He takes the gun back. Walks silence. Newton to lighten mood, as he understands at some level Atma’s pain.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Accha sir yeh batao...

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Jungle mein sawal sirf main poochta hoon. (changes mood) Yeh lo, supari khao.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton walks with Priya and Loknath.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Sir, aapka koi rishteydaar mantri hai kya? Ya koi aur tagdi backing? Newton glares at Loknath.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kyon Loknath ji?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Sir, bina backing yahan CRP ke afsaro se aise pesh koi aa hi nahi sakta. Priya smiles at Newton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group reaches a ghost village in a jungle clearing: a around are broken down, damaged houses (about 8), with no soul in sight.  34 35 34. They walk past a broken down hand pump.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yahan sab ghar toote kyon hai? Aur log kahan hai?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Maowadiyon se bacha kar unhe campo mein bhej diya hai. As they walk through the ghost village.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ghar naksaliyon ne tode hai?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Nahi humne. Taki naksali kabza na kar sake.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Logon ko gaon se bhaga kar unke ghar tod diye? Yeh kiska idea tha?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Har sawaal ka jawaab nahi hota. Newton looks around, feels sad and asks Krishna.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yeh ghar todna aapne kiss training school mein seekha?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They reach the two room school which is at the far end of Ghost Village. An advance party is waiting for them.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Lijiye. School aa gaya. Chaliye bataiye kahan booth banega? Newton walks around the building examining the situation. wooden door is broken and a couple of windows of the scho have been removed. There are a dozen bullet holes on the school walls He walks around the corner and looks startled and signals others to come. There is Maoist graffiti scrawled on the wall. It looks o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They enter the two room school room and examine it.  36 37 38

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Teacher vagerah kahan gaye?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: (to Lakhma) Batao beta.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Saal mein do baar 15 August aur 26 January ko master dikhte hai. Unhi do din Jan Gan Mann bhi sunai deta hai. Ab pata nahi kaunsa gunn gaa rahe hai.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Polling Team huddles.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Priya ji, iss booth ka survey kisne kiya?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Maine.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Phir yeh?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: (mumbles ) Jo hai wahi likha tha report mein.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton keeps staring at the graffiti on the wall of the school. He looks disturbed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sound of constables talking is heard faintly in the distance. A) Tall and thick Sal trees sway in the cool morning bree B) Trees. Hills. 38B C) A caterpillar/ insect stuck in a spider web/ hanging o the tree. D) A honeycomb. Bees buzz. 38D E) An ancient ant hill. 38E

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton, his three polling officers set up the place. Newt looks at the diagram of an ideal polling booth in his handbook. The difference is alarming. They place the foldable tables as per the directives, mak space for the polling booth, enclose it with cardboard. Priya takes out the register of voters and places it on h table. Newton and Shambhu arrange the booth. Loknath takes out a bottle of indelible ink and places it his table. Newton takes out the EVM and connects the two units. He ensures that the seal is intact. Newton checks his watch. It’s seven seconds to 8 am. Six. Five. Four. Three. Two. One. Newton presses the ON button of the EVM. BGM stops. SILEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three polling officers are sitting next to each other the table. They wait. Wait. CU of Newton- studying the list of voters. CU of Priya- looks outside. CU of Loknath- suppresses a yawn. CU of Shambhu- he looks dazed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A) An armed constable stands guard at the door of the sch B) At a distance under a tree, Krishna stands with Rajend who fixes him some tobacco. C) 3 SPOs and the police head constable are huddled aroun stove that they are setting up to make tea. They are gossipping in Gondi in whispers.

dialogues.speaker: 44G
dialogues.text: 45 37. D) Atma Singh in his Aviator sunglasses, dozes off on a c outside the hut. His transistor is on. Playing BBC Hindi news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRPF constables are on patrolling duty in batches of two. At least 6 different batches are shown walking in 44B the forest or on sentry duty in the periphery. CRPF constables are on patrolling duty in batches of two. CRPF constables are on patrolling duty in batches of two. CRPF constables are on patrolling duty in batches of two. CRPF constables are on patrolling duty in batches of two. Constable hums a song in the tune of “Ek din bik jayega m ke mol” as he keeps watch.

dialogues.speaker: SINGING CONSTABLE
dialogues.text: Hmmm hmmm hmmm hmmm hmmm... hmmm hmmm hmmm hmmm... Another constable comes in front of them and ‘shoots’ him with his finger (shaped like a gun). He pretends to be sh by ‘bullets’ and falls down slowly, gasping for breath li in an 80’s film.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton looks eagerly at the door of the School. Priya is still doodling. Loknath shifts his position as he naps wi his head resting on the table.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Priya, aap teacher ho?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Hau.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya padati ho?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Chhote bacche hote hain to sab padhana hota hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aapko accha lagta hai padhana?  38.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Kaafi pareshaani hoti hai. Yahan ke bacche Gondi bolte hain magar padai saari Hindi mein hoti hai. Jitna ho sakta hai main Gondi mein samjhati hoon magar kitaab mein kya likha hai unhe samajh nahi aata. Newton nods. Loknath is suddenly alerted from his slumber.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Hindi mein kuch nahi rakha. MA hoon Hindi sahitya mein, dekho aaj kahan hoon. English padao baccho ko. Aajkal to kutte bhi English samajhte hain. Newton and Priya look at him. He has woken up and looks fresh.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Aap bolte ho English?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Seekh raha hoon.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Adult education?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Nahi sir. Adult...Matlab english film dekh ke. Aapko shaug hai? Dhero hain phone mein.. Return of Dracula, Bride of Chucky, Seed of Chucky...

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Bada gyaan hai aapke phone mein?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Chinese maal mein aisa hi hota hai. They chuckle. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Sir, aap shadi shuda hai? Newton Nahi.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Aur aap madam?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Nahi.  39. Awkward silence. Newton Aur aap?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: 83 mein love marriage honi thi. Uska baap utpaat na machata to aaj teen teen bacche hotey. Tab kahan fashion tha love marriage ka? Ek seth Budau se byah diya Kamla ko.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: (taking his trip) Yeh to bahut bura hua.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Kyon? Vidhwa Sethani hai aaj meri Kamla. Hame nahi poochti yeh aur baat hai. Humne bhi kaha chalo jo hai so hai. Ab lekhak ko kasht nahi hoga to kahani kaise phootegi?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Aap lekhak hai Loknath ji? He nods proudly. Silence.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya likh rahe ho aajkal?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Kahani ek election party ki hai jo jungle mein voting karane jaati hai magar laut ke nahi aati.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Laut ke kyon nahi aati?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Kyonki gaon wale aadivaasi kai baras pehle mar chuke hain. Unki laashein Jombie ban chuki hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Jombie?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Khoon ki pyaasi zinda laash. Ekdum sadi gali. Kaisa laga plot?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ekdukm wahiyaat. English picturen dekh dekh ke aapka dimaag kharab ho gaya hai.  40. Loknath looks in disbelief. Priya laughs. Loknath pulls out a pack of cards defiantly. He starts shuffling. He looks at Priya. Newton is amused.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Taash khelna mana hai Loknathji. Andar rakh do. Loknath freezes.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Sirji booth mein taash khelne ki purani parampara hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Department mein bhi suspend hone ki purani Parampara hai. Loknath keeps the playing cards in his pocket. Loknath comes towards Newton.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Sabse purani parampara to bhavishyawaani ki hai. Kar doon? Newton is confused as to what is going on. Loknath taking advantage of the situation shuffles the ca and spread them on the table. Then he takes three cards a puts them in a line. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Ab inhe bina dekhe indhar udhar kare. Newton does it. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Ab jo pehla card hai woh aap kal thhe, jo card beech mein hai woh aap ab ho, aur teesra card kal! Newton for a minute is perplexed genuinely. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Please Sir, itna toh kijiye. He picks three cards and places them- facing down on the table. Loknath unfolds card 1: 2 of Hearts. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Kal aap thhe duggi magar dilwale.  46

dialogues.speaker: 46C
dialogues.text: 47 48 4l. He unfolds Card 2: Joker LOKNATH (CONT’D) Aaj aap joker hain kyonki chunav mein presiding officer hain. He is about to pick the third card.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Tameez se Loknathji. Iss bakwaas mein mujhe vishwas nahi.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Bhavisyawani sunke bade bade darr jate hain. Chaliye nahi uthaenye teesra patta... Saying this, he keeps the card in his front shirt pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peepul trees. Leaves sway in the breeze. Patterns of sun light are formed. A dense grove. Monkeys play on branches high up. Scores o them. There is a battle between two alpha males. A little baby monkey, stuck to his mother’s bosom looks 4 happy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton walks out of the School and looks for Atma Singh. Lakhma is outside.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sahab kahan hai?

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Field exercise pe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atma Singh is barking instructions.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Aur upar jao! Haan! He is standing under the tree with two armed constables. watches SPOs JOGA and KOSA (20's) who have climbed up on tree and are choosing the mangoes from the branches. Newton and Lakhma enter. Newton looks irritated and obser  42.

dialogues.speaker: JOGA
dialogues.text: Yeh wala paka nahi hai.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Woh dekho daayein... Abe baayein nahin daayein. Abe mera daayaan, tera baayaaan. Joga looks confused as he scampers on the tree branch. He throws a couple of raw mangoes down which Raju catches. Newton stands next to Atma Singh and clears his throat.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yahan se bastiyan kitni door hai?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Raju, Newton sahab ki madad karo.

dialogues.speaker: SPO RAJU
dialogues.text: Ek basti poorab mein khaai ke taraf ded kilometer andar hai aur doosri uss taraf pahad ke taraf do kilometer.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Dekhiye boycott ki wajeh se logon ka na aana swabhavik hai. Toh iss situation mein main chahta hun ki kuch constables ko unki basti mein bhejkar unhe yahan surakshit le aate hai. Atma Singh spits a seed.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Sorry. Woh nahi ho sakta. (to Joga) Catch do!

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kaise nahi ho sakta? Main presiding officer hoon. Aapko mera nirdesh Man-na hoga. Atma Singh catches a mango. As he rubs it against his shi and bites it, he talks.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Aapka hukum polling booth ke 200 metre ki range mein hai. Uske aage mera order chalta. Aur main kewal apne superiors ke nirdesh maanta hoon. Aapki tarah hamara bhi procedure hota hai. He offers Newton a raw mango. Newton shakes his head.  43. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Kha lo na? Aapse kuch personal thodi hai. Aapko zero voting ka darr hai na? Nahi hone doonga. Mere aadmi de denge vote. Chutti nahi milti vote kaise denge? Newton is astounded.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Main yeh sab jaalsaazi nahi hone doonga.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Lagbhag sattar voter hai. Polling agent to chhodiye, ek neta nahi dikha. Na laptop wala, na muft ke chawal wala. Aur aap hame jaalsaaz kehte hain?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Main apni duty kar raha hoon. Atma Singh takes another piece.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Kya age kya hai aapki?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Main chalees ka hoon. Aap?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Age ka iss sab se kya lena-dena?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Topic change kar raha hoon. Age ko chhodo... accha yeh batao: what is two plus two divided by two?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Two. Atma Singh is delighted. Chewing the mango piece he nods.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Three. Rule Rule karte ho aur basic rule bhool gaye? Addition se pehle division karna padta hai.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Newton walks to the school, Lakhma hesitatingly asks.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Newton sir aapke paas motorcycle hai?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Nahi.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Main agle mahine lene wala hoon. Handa. Sir ek baat poocho aap bura to nahi manoge?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Bolo.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Sir aap socho ki aap jitna kaam karte ho utna hi karte raho magar aapki tankha dugni ho jaye?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Main rishwat nahi leta.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Waise nahi sir.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: To tankha kaise dugni hogi?

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Ek scheme hai. Shuru mein paanch sau rupaye dene hote hai. Phir dus log aur dhoondhne hote hai jo paanch paanch sau rupaye de. Har naye member pe paisa milta hai. Phir aise hi kadi se kadi judti rahegi aur aap ghar baithe note chapoge. Scheme wale sab samjhate hain. Meeting hoti hai tab khaana bhi milta hai. Sukma mein to ek memberin ne do mahine mey hi Sony ka mobile le liya. Sirf paanch sau rupaye lagte hai. Lakhpati ban jaoge. Bolo Sir? Newton is irritated at Lakhma’s pyramid scheme and quips childish accent.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Jab tum lakhpati ban jao to apne bangle par khaane pe bulana. Tab baat karenge. He walks towards the school.  50 51 52 45.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton enters the booth to see sits deep in thought with worried expression on his face. A writing pad lies open before him. Loknath, Priya and Shambhu are watching an English film o his cell phone. Music of an action scene. The hero seems to have saved th heroine.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Phone allowed nahi hai...

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Yahan network kahan hai? Tower hi nahi hai jungle mein... Newton looks away. The actors in the movie get close and start making out. The woman starts moaning. Loknath, Priya and Shambhu are embarrassed. Priya looks away while Loknath fumbles with the phone try to shut it down. Shambhu simply smiles at Newton sheepish

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rajendra walks with some jawans carrying the raw mangoes.

dialogues.speaker: JAWAN
dialogues.text: Kuch bhi kaho. Chunav ka apna maza hai. Tyohaar jaisa lagta hai. Service mein aane se pehle hum raajneeti mein jaana chahte the...desh ka sochte the... Atma Singh, who's walking a few paces behind, kicks him o his butt in jest.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Netagiri karni hai? Sab saalo ko jail kar do. Raaton raat desh sudhar jaega. Jo ye paisath saal mein nahi ukhaad paaye ek dictator danda karke dus saal mein kar dega. Saale macchar desh ka khoon chooste hai.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mosquito buzzes.  53 46.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Sab apni duty hi to kar rahe hai. Commandent sahab ne aise hi chunav dekhe honge.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yeh nakli election nahi hai.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Main samajhta hoon sir. Mera kewal itna kehna hai ki yeh log bina hilaye hilte nahi, aur hilte hain to rukte nahi hai. Ek prakar ke jombie ban chuke hai yeh log.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: (confrontational) Toh kya main kuch nahi karu?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Aap akele nahi hai sir. Hum sab milkar kuch nahi karenge... bas yeh saale... Saying this Loknath swats a mosquito on his forearm. She looks LOKNATH (CONT’D) Cream ki adhi tube mal di, tab bhi khoon choos rahe hai. Mujhe thodi sarsarahat si bhi ho rahi hai.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Khoon choosne wale tube se mare hai? Iska ilaaj hai. Chalo ek minute mein ho jaega. Malaria nahi hoga. at Newton. Loknath looks doubtful.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Try kar lo Loknathji. By chance kuch hua, waise hoga to nahi, phir bhi hua to Cerebral malaria bhi ho sakta hai. Loknath looks frightened for real. Priya walks out of the school.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Shubh shubh bolo sir. Jadi booti hai kya?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton and Loknath are standing in front of the school ne to the sentry.  47. Priya is looking for something in the bushes outside the school. She breaks a stem and comes out, holding it. Red Ants hav made a nest from 3 leaves and the branch is laden with th

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Yeh kya hai?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Patta chabana hai.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Nahi chintiyon se katwana hai. Aap shirt utaro main chinti chodti hoon. Cheentiyaan kaategi toh Aap paseena paseena ho jaogey. Aur do teen ghante mein malaria gayab! Newton laughs.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Main mazak nahi kar rahi. Chinti se hi katwana hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Accha? Yeh treatment hai? Ok.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Sir main ekdum theek mehsoos kar raha hoon. Dekhiye fast chal bhi paa raha hoon. He walks around and goes into the room. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Bus, thank you... Priya eats an ant and throws the branch away.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Aap bhi khaa ke dekho. She gives him one. Newton hesitates and takes it and puts in his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Khatta hai. Acidic.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Iski chutney banti hai. Badi tasty hoti hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Interesting.  54 48.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Interesting yeh hai ki yahan se kuch hi ghante door rehne ke bawajood aapko yahan ka kuch nahi pata.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: (mulls) Baat aapki sahi hai...

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Aap itne padhe likhe ho, mujhe ek baat poochni thi jo kabhi samajh mein nahi aayi.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Yeh rule kisne banaya ki ek insaan doosre insaan pe hukum kaise chala sakta hai? Newton is struck by that question. Just then loud voice of two boys singing a song comes. Ne gives a puzzled look at Priya.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: (pleasantly) Koi gaa raha hai?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton and Priya follow the voice and see that two Gondi children not older than 13 surrounded by CRPF jawans are singing a Gondi song. Atma Singh sits on a ledge and list to them.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya ho raha hai yeh sab? The two children become quiet upon hearing Newton's voice The CRPF men are also alarmed. Atma Singh's voice is heard.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Interrogation. Newton Kis baat ki interrogation? Priya talks to the children in Gondi and hears their vers Atma Singh is perturbed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton to Priya.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kya hua?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Kuch nahi. Ped pe chad ke khel rahe the.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Khabri hai sab. Ped pe chad ke booth mein jhank rahe the ki kitne aadmi they.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kitne aadmi they? Yeh Kalia hai jo yahan dekhke Gabbar ko khabar dene jayenge, ain?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Bade harami hai yeh bacche. Isse bhi chhote hote hai unki fauj mein.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Jee nahi.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Tere se kaun baat kar raha hai? Tere to sage wale hai yeh.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aap inse aise baat nahi kar sakte. (Beat) Agar yeh khabri hai to inse gaana kyon gawa rahe the?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: To aap chahte hain main baccho pe haath uthaun? Unhe peetu? (to Lakhma) Poocho, koi movement thi kya? The child replies.

dialogues.speaker: BOY
dialogues.text: Nahi.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Dekha kaise fatt kar ke “nahi” bola? Aye Mowgli, aaja idhar. The child comes to him, eyeing his AK 47 which hands on h shoulder. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Dekho aa gaya. Saala Hindi to jaanta hai. Natak karta hai mere saath?  50. The child nods his head. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Bol! Atma Singh looks deeply into his eyes. The boy looks back Puppy eyes. Atma Singh takes out his cell phone and direc the camera side towards the boy and clicks a picture. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Apne gaon ja aur sab ko yahan lekar aa. Bolo voting honi hai. Samjhha? The boy looks at Lakhma. Lakhma translates what Atma Sing said in Gondi. The boy nods ‘yes’. Newton and Priya watch in horror.

dialogues.speaker: RAJENDRA
dialogues.text: Chal bhaag... Atma Singh looks pleased with himself and keeps his cell phone back into his pocket. When he turns back, he sees Newton, who looks furious but is very polite and respectf in his tone. Kids run away.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Aapke benefit ke liye hi ho raha hai bandobast.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aap aise hi vardi ke dum pe jisse chahe dhamka rahe hai?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Vardi mein vinti dhamki hi lagti hai. Lakhma repeats this line softly, nodding his head, highly amused at the word play. The constables laugh.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yeh log apke ghulam nahi hai! Atma Singh glares at Newton.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Newton ho Newton hi raho. Einstein ban-ne ki koshish mat karo. Samajhte ho na main kya keh raha hoon, Newton babu? Atma Singh straightens Newton’s collar.  51. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Ek-aadh ghante mein hum bhi nikal lenge. Attack shaam ko jyaada hote hai. Jaaiye, tambu mein duty kariye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton is at his table. He’s writing furiously.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Loknathji hum Atma Singh ke paas exactly kitne baje pahuche the?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Jee yahi koi paune cheh baje honge? Newton notes it down.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aur wahan se savva cheh- sade cheh chale the. Hai na?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Aisa hi kuch hoga.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Theek theek batao.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Main cheh bees pe aayi thi.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Hmm. He keeps writing.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Aap complaint likh rahe ho? Newton ignores him. Priya and Loknath look at each other. Loknath gestures at her to do something. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Aap kyon apna BP bada rahe ho. Hum sab ko pata hai aap kitne chintit hai chunav ko lekar... Dekhiye Chunav ke baad sirf ek badlaw aata hai. He looks around.

dialogues.speaker: SHAMBHU
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Netao ke photo badalte hai.  56 57 52. Newton is at his wit’s end. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Aur nahi toh kya, logon ko do waqgt ka khana naseeb ho ya na ho, unhe har election mey vote zaroor karna chahiye. Newton looks at Priya.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aap bhi inki hi tarah nirashawadi hai? Priya looks hesitant.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Nahin, main aadivaasi hoon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Constables off sentry duty are resting outside a broken d hut.

dialogues.speaker: CONSTABLE
dialogues.text: Yaar meri galti thodi hai ki mere dadaji ne azaadi ke jung mein hissa nahi liya. Freedom fighter hotey toh kamse kum quota mein gas agency toh mil jaati.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton is studying his manual silently, Priya is reading newspaper and Loknath is watching an 80’s Hindi film on h cell phone. Shambhu takes a selfie with the sentry’s gun.

dialogues.speaker: SENTRY
dialogues.text: Aap jungle mein kyun aaye? Koi approach nahin tha kya mana karneka?

dialogues.speaker: SHAMBHU
dialogues.text: Mujhe helicopter mein baithna tha. Newton is irritated by the dialogues from the film. But Loknath is too immersed to notice or care. The sentry at the door calls out.

dialogues.speaker: SENTRY
dialogues.text: Newton ji... Polcent line pe hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kaun?

dialogues.speaker: SENTRY
dialogues.text: Ji, Polcent. Yaani IG sahab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton is outside. He picks up the wireless.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A convoy of jeeps is heading deeper in a convoy of three Scorpios. Seated in a jeep is a tough looking man in uniform, IG VE (late 40's). Next to him, sit two white journalists from DEBBIE (30, in salwar kameez) and ADAM (30's). Verma barks on his wireless.

dialogues.speaker: VERMA
dialogues.text: Newton?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yes Sir?

dialogues.speaker: VERMA
dialogues.text: Kitne percent vote gire?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Zero. Sir, yahan toh kuch theek nahi ho raha, yeh order nahi maan rahe- Verma softens his tone, cups his hands around his wireles

dialogues.speaker: VERMA
dialogues.text: Hello. Suno. Woh aa rahe hai. Atma Singh lekar aaega meri baat ho gai hai. Main inspection karne saade gyarah tak aa raha hoon. Foreign media hai saath. Mahoul jama dena. Mood, colour, anecdote. Sab chahiye. Clear?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sir. Verma hangs up.  59 60 62 61 54. Newton looks jubilantly at Atma Singh. Taking cue, he dir his men, Krishna and Rajendra. He draws a rough map on th ground below with a stick.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Newton ji voter laane ke liye bees bees jawano ki do tukdiya jaengi. Ek khaai wale gaon mey aur doosra pahad wale. Main bhi jaunga. Aap aagya de to hum chale?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kissi ko jabardasti laane ki aavashyakta nahi hai. Kewal chunav hain yeh bata de. Jo aana chahe aapke saath aa sakte hain.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: (sarcastic) Jabardasti aur hum? Kya keh rahe hain Newton babu? Aap kahe to bandook yahi chhod jaye? The constables betray subdued laughter. Newton looks a bi apprehensive.

dialogues.speaker: INTERVAL
dialogues.text: EXT. JUNGLE PATH 1- DAY (Jungle near Ghost Village) 59 Atma Singh, SPOs Lakhma, Joga and a dozen constables, arm with guns walk the forest path downwards towards Hamlet 1 EXT. JUNGLE PATH 2- DAY (Jungle near Ghost Village) 60 Krishna and Rajendra are moving towards Hamlet 2 on the hillock with a dozen troops armed with AK47s. SPO Kosa, D are with them. The monkeys on the trees are alerted by their presence an scream. EXT. JUNGLE, HILLOCK- DAY (Jungle near Hamlet 2) 62 Krishna and his troops walk downhill. They cross some gra EXT. JUNGLE, STREAM- DAY (Jungle near Hamlet 1) 61 Atma Singh and his troops cross a dry stream.  63 64 65 55.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton, Priya and Loknath are sipping tea at the door of school. Loknath muses.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Iss jageh ka itihas pata hai kisiko? Bahut pracheen hai... They look at him. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Dandkaranya yaani veh jageh jahan daand diya jaaye. Ramji aur Sitaji yahin aaye the vanvaas kaatne. Surpanakha ki naak yahin kati thi, yahin Sitaji ne Lakshmanrekha laanghi, aur yehi se Ravan unka apharan karke Sri Lanka le gaya tha...Itihaas bahut hai yahan. They nod disinterestedly. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Aap log bacche rahe honge jab Ramanand Sagar ka serial doordarshan par aaya tha. India ka pehla plane Pushpak bhi yahin uda tha pehli baar. EXT. HAMLET 1- DAY (Achanakpur) 64 (Take shots of mundane life before raid) Atma Singh’s party enters the hamlet. SPO Joga shouts in his megaphone in Gondi.

dialogues.speaker: JOGA
dialogues.text: (Shouts instructions in Gondi to come out with their cards for voting) EXT HAMLET 2- DAY (Rampur) 65 (Take shots mundane of life before raid) Krishna and Rajendra and their men enter the hamlet. Dinu shouts in his megaphone.

dialogues.speaker: DINU
dialogues.text: (instructs in Gondi to come and fall in with their ID cards)  66 67 68 69 70 71 72 56.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two Constables and an SPO enter a house. Women are workin beedis in their courtyard look alarmed.

dialogues.speaker: CONSTABLE 1
dialogues.text: Sabko line up karo.

dialogues.speaker: SPO JOGA
dialogues.text: (tells them in Gondi to come to vote)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rajendra and some constables round up older men and women are sitting and making mahua. A couple of men are drinkin in leaves.

dialogues.speaker: RAJENDRA
dialogues.text: Bolo sab ko card laneko.

dialogues.speaker: DINU
dialogues.text: (translates)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some constables tell two men sitting in their yard to com out with their cards. There is communication gap. “Vayo Vayo”.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPOs are explaining in Gondi to a bunch of people who hav assembled. Mostly kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the distance, an old man runs into the jungle.

dialogues.speaker: ROMESH
dialogues.text: Woh dekh bhag gaya... usko roko! Two constables run behind the man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rajendra is getting his Mahua bottle filled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gondi folk are made to sit down with their cards in their hands.

dialogues.speaker: 73B
dialogues.text: 74 57. Atma Singh cleans his sunglasses with his breath, wipes i with a kerchief and wears it. SPO Joga gives them instructions. They all raise their ca

dialogues.speaker: SPO JOGA
dialogues.text: (instructions in Gondi)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two constables chase the running man in the rice fields. of stops and aims at him.

dialogues.speaker: FASTER CONSTABLE
dialogues.text: Ruko nahin toh goli maroonga! The man stops with his hands up. They seize him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Constables search a hut. A sick man is sleeping. They mak him to come out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Constables open a pig sty, a large pig runs out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Constables stand on guard with their guns. A group of wom are talking to Rajendra in Gondi.

dialogues.speaker: RAJENDRA
dialogues.text: Sab buddhe dikh rahe hai. Ladke ladkiyan kab lautenge? Old woman points at 60 degrees.

dialogues.speaker: OLD WOMAN
dialogues.text: (Speaks in Gondi)

dialogues.speaker: RAJENDRA
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: DINU
dialogues.text: Jab sooraj wahan hoga. Do dhai baje.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Constable Romesh walks towards a stack of hay begin to carelessly stomp on it and disheveling it.  75 76

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krishna is talking to some people. He’s polite.

dialogues.speaker: MIDDLEAGED WOMAN
dialogues.text: (Speaks in Gondi.)

dialogues.speaker: KOSA
dialogues.text: Dadalog ne vote dene se mana kiya hai.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Kab aaye the kitne aaye the? Poocho usko.

dialogues.speaker: KOSA
dialogues.text: (Speaks in Gondi) The woman shakes her head. Krishna pulls out a folded b/w print-out with four mug sh

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Isme se koi tha kya? The woman shakes her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Constables get an old man (Pistak) to vote. He comes with grand kid. Behind him, three constables are bringing a couple out of their hut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krishna and Rajendra are trying to control the chaotic situation. The Gondis are arguing with them. One of them is a bit vehement. Rajendra slaps him. The man stares at him.

dialogues.speaker: RAJENDRA
dialogues.text: Ghoorta hai? He gives him another slap. Krishna calms him down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atma Singh studies a printout with faces of wanted guerrillas. He looks at the men and women who are sitting Indian style on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: 75C
dialogues.text: 77 78 59. In the background, SPO Joga questions the sick man. The m looks scared and pleads innocence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An unattended infant watches. Wide eyed. Adults are all sitting in front of a hut in a straight li with their IDs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A petrified man is hiding on a tree. A constable is stand under the tree.

dialogues.speaker: CONSTABLE
dialogues.text: O Haddi Pehelwan! Neecha aao bhai. Vote karna hai.

dialogues.speaker: PETRIFIED MAN
dialogues.text: (speaks no in Gondi.) Constable shakes the tree. The man holds tight.

dialogues.speaker: CONSTABLE
dialogues.text: Aajao bhai... tumhara adhikaar hai.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A constable is examining the ID cards of the villagers. N all villagers have it. They separate the ones who have ca Two villagers, extremely drunk, are in their own world creating commotion. One has an old key tied to a black thread around his neck Atma Singh grabs the key and pulls the man.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Yeh chabi kiski hai? Drunk points to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: DRUNKARD
dialogues.text: Mere baap ke lohe ke khazane ki chabi hai. Zameen mey arab arab arab gade hai. Atma Singh snatches the key and throws it away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton, Priya and Loknath are waiting at their tables.  79 80

dialogues.speaker: 80B
dialogues.text: 81 60. Silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atma Singh listens as a constable speaks on his walkie.

dialogues.speaker: CONSTABLE
dialogues.text: Alpha calling Alpha 1. SitRep do. Over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krishna answers on his walkie.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Alpha, this is Alpha 1. Situation normal. Over.

dialogues.speaker: A LITTLE AWAY
dialogues.text: Rajendra is talking to a middle aged woman.

dialogues.speaker: RAJENDRA
dialogues.text: Bada wala kaato. Masale tej hone chahiye samjhe? He forks out a fifty rupee note. Her husband (or she) walks to the rooster, trying to catc it. Very calculatingly, he hovers around the rooster maki placating noises and with one swoop catches him by his ne and wrings it. He takes out his iron jack knife which is tied to his wai and raises it!

dialogues.speaker: JUMP CUT TO
dialogues.text: Silence. A rooster’s feather floats in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
