dialogues.text: Newton is at the door of the school, looking at the crowd that has assembled. Most of them are older folk. There ar also a lot of children.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Youth kahan hai?

dialogues.speaker: DINU
dialogues.text: Thhe nahi. Kaam pe gaye hai.  61.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Par aa jayenge na?

dialogues.speaker: DINU
dialogues.text: Bol ke rakha hai.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Theek time bataya hai na, subeh ki tarah toh nahi kiya?

dialogues.speaker: DINU
dialogues.text: Nahi nahi! The Lakhma, the SPOs and Dinu direct them in Gondi to sta in a line.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aadmi saare uss taraf. Mahilayein iss taraf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton is at his table with the control unit.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Chaliye ab ek ek karke sabko andar bhejiye. Aap log ready hai?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Haan ready.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Loknath ji? He holds out his ink bottle like a trophy.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Aadesh kare.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: (gestures at the first woman ) Aa jao... An old woman comes to Priya.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Card? She shows her card. Priya finds her name on the list and ticks it. She puts her thumb impression next to her name the list. Priya directs her to Loknath. The old woman walks to Loknath. He signals her to show he index finger and puts an ink mark on it.  83 62. Newton directs the woman to the booth. He goes and holds control unit, which has a button which needs to be presse the time someone is voting.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Wahan par button daba ke vote de. The next person in the queue is let in and he goes to Pri with his card held out. The old woman stands in front of the EVM. Newton is watch her from afar, waiting for her to press a button.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Arre wahan khade mat raho. Vote do aur fatafat niklo. She looks at the Electronic Voting Machine and nervously looks at everyone who is anticipating some magic to happe from her end.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Samasya kya hai inki? Newton looks at Priya, searching for answers.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Sir, yahan toh election pehli baar hua hai na.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Matlab inhone voting machine pehli baar dekh rahi hain! Newton looks open mouthedly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are 30 CRPF constables accompanying the journalists All the 8 journalists are wearing bullet proof jackets an helmets. Verma CHATS with Debbie. Adam shoots them. A Zee News reporter walks backwards as the cameraman move towards him with a video camera. He talks very softly, huffing and puffing as if there is grave danger.

dialogues.speaker: ZEE NEWS REPORTER
dialogues.text: Yeh jungle jitna khoobsoorat hai usse zyada khatarnaak. Ambush kahin bhi lag sakta hai, IEDs aur surang kahin bhi phat sakte hai. Iss dehshatmand ilaake mein maut baatne wale naxali aur zehreele cobra kabhi bhi mil sakte hai!  84 63.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The villagers are sitting on the ground, Indian style. Ne addresses them, holding the polystyrene model of the voti machine.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sab log dhyan se suno. Aap sab log ek ek karke apna apna vote denge. Yeh machine aapka vote legi.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: (translates) Newton gives a firm but benevolent look. The Drunkard asks a question in broken Hindi.

dialogues.speaker: DRUNKARD
dialogues.text: Kitna paisa milega?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Paisa? SPOs and Krishna scold him together.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Aye baith neeche! Newton signals Krishna to not meddle.

dialogues.speaker: DRUNKARD
dialogues.text: (trailing off) Logon ko to milta hai vote dene ka paisa?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Vote dena aapka adhikaar hai. Na koi aapko paisa dega aur na hi koi zor zabardasti hogi. Priya batao na inhe. Priya nods.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: (translates) Silence. Blank faces.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sab samajh gaye? Kissi ko kuch poochna hai? Daro mat! Poocho. He senses some hesitation in a middle aged woman and encourages her to speak up.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aap... haan... poochiye...  64.

dialogues.speaker: MIDDLE AGED WOMAN
dialogues.text: (speaks in Gondi) Newton looks at Priya.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Poochti hai inhe kya fayda hoga?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yeh desh ka sabse bada chunav hai. Lok Sabha ka. Aap sab ko sadak, bijli, paani, samajik nyay vagerah chahiye na? Aap jise vote doge woh aapke liye yeh sab karega. She MUMBLES something in Gondi to her companions.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kya hua?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Yeh pooch rahi hai Lok sabha kya hai? Newton gathers himself.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Lok Sabha matlab jahan desh ke sabse bade kanoon bante hai.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Hamare apne kanoon hai sir. Hazaron saal purane. Newton is annoyed.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aaap kewal anuwwad kare. Please co- operate. Inhe bataiye inka neta dilli jaega.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: (Translation- the leader you choose with go to Delhi.) They all nod. They mumble amongst themselves. Some of the Adivasis point to an old bearded man with gray locks. He smiles and stands up. They speak to Newton who doesn’t understand.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yeh keh rahe hai yehi inka neta hai. Isse inki taraf se Dilli bheja ja sakta hai. They nod. Newton is at his wits end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeh kaise Dilli jaenge! Priya samjhao na. Candidates ki list padho! 65. Newton looks at PRIYA and prompts her to translate this. translates and then reads out the list.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Meena Kumari (Indian National Party) Lingaram Netam (Bharatiya Vikas Party) Lalsingh Tekam (Lok Seva Dal) Budhri Patel (Independent) Gladstone Usendi (Independent ) Dr. Joga Chaudhary (Independent) Muttaka Masram (Krishi Party) Bedu Ram Kashyap (People's Front) Satter Netam (Independent) Nelawati Devi (Independent) Binod Kumar (Rashtriya Dal) Comrade Bhim Kumar (Kisan Party) Jhitku Ram (Janata Sangh) Maheshwar Baghel (Adarsh Bharat Party) At each candidate’s name, we cut to a unique visual of th candidate or his/her poster. The visuals are all set in t town: (A) T-shirt (B) Newspaper advertisement (C) Painting on Wall (D) Posters on Wall (E) Cut Out being transported by hand. (F) Printed on bags which are hung in a shop. (G) writing on a Gandhi cap worn by a supporter who's distributing pamphlets. (H) Cycle rickshaw with loudspeakers (I) Party Office with cut out and posters. (J) Umbrella (K) Parked Bike with flag and sticker (L) Poster on wall (M) Children with masks of the candidate’s face  66. (N) flex with Barack Obama We cut back to the scene: The Adivasis are looking at Priya blankly.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Iss soochi mein se kissi ko bhi vote de sakte ho. They shake their heads and murmur. Newton looks at Priya translation.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Yeh naam aaj yeh pehli baar sun rahe hai. The old man asks a question in Gondi.

dialogues.speaker: OLD MAN
dialogues.text: (asks question in Gondi) Newton looks at Priya for translation. Atma Singh checks his watch and looks at Krishna. Krishna shakes his head as he is listening to the walkie.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Sir inko sirf yeh pata karna hai ki in netaon mey se kaunsa neta tendu patta ka sahi bhaav dilwaega? Newton has no answer. A woman asks something to Priya.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sir yeh kehti hai ki vote diya toh dadalog pareshan karenge, nahi diya toh police. Koi inhe poochta nahi hai inhe kya chahiye.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya chahiye hai inhe?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Inhe donon se chutkara chahiye.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aisa inhone kaha? Priya’s doesn’t make eye contact. An exasperated Atma Singh, his arms folded across his che is standing at a distance. His eyes meet Loknath’s. Loknath shrugs. He says to Newton softly.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Sir, main handle karoon?  67. Newton dismisses him with a gesture.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sochne do yaar! Loknath sulkily looks towards Atma Singh and gestures at to do something. Atma Singh comes and takes over.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Newton babu, aap ke bas ki lag nahi rahi hai. Now let me take over. (shouts at the Adivasis) Sharam aani chahiye aap logon ko. SPO Joga translates in real time.

dialogues.speaker: JOGA
dialogues.text: (Translation)

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Dekhiye, sirf aap logon ke liye yeh babulog apni jaan jokhim mein daal kar shehar se jungle aye hai.

dialogues.speaker: JOGA
dialogues.text: (Translation)

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yeh kya bol rahe ho! Atma Singh ignores him. Newton aggressively moves towards Atma Singh, Rajendra stops him.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Mehmaano ke saath aap log aise pesh aate hai? Unhe pareshaan karte hai?

dialogues.speaker: JOGA
dialogues.text: (Translation)

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Dekhiye voting machine ke khilone jaisa hai...

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya bakwaas kar rahe ho aap?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Aapka pehla election hai, itna uddo mat. Khudse to kuch ho nahi raha hai, aur jo kar sakte hain unko obstruct karte ho. Newton loses it and screams.  68.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Obstruct main nahi aap kar rahe ho. Yeh sab jaega meri report main. Ek ek point likhunga. Dikhaunga!

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Rajendra! (to the Adivasis) Haan to main keh raha tha ki iss khilone se khelna bahut aasan hai. Rajendra takes Newton away.

dialogues.speaker: RAJENDRA
dialogues.text: Aaiye sir..Aaiye na..idhar...

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Isme seb hai, anar hai, chashma hai, phool hai, motorcycle hai, bansuri hai, ghoda hai, hawai jahaz hai, lota hai, nota hai- aapko jo cheez acchi lagti hai uss par button daba do. Bas.

dialogues.speaker: JOGA
dialogues.text: (Translates) As Joga translates, a voice is heard.

dialogues.speaker: DRUNKARD
dialogues.text: Humein chotta baccha samjhta hai kya?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: (shouts ) Kaun bola!!? Cold silence. He searches the crowd for the miscreant. Ti faces stare back. Newton comes back.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sahi bol raha hai. Aap inse aise baat nahi kar sakte.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Aapse poocha maine? Lakhma! Khada kar do inhe line mein.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Atma Singh aap power ka misuse kar rahe hain. Main dekh loonga. Atma Singh faces Newton and walks, Newton retreats.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Abhi dekh lo jo dekhna hai.  85 86 87 69. The old bearded Gondi man with grey locks comes to them a says something very forcefully. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Kya bol raha hai yeh?

dialogues.speaker: SPO LAKHMA
dialogues.text: (hesitates) Gaon ka majhi hai. Kehta hai aap logon ka faisla yeh kar sakta hai.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Yeh inn sab ka mukhiya hai? The Headman nods.

dialogues.speaker: SPO LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Haan. Atma Singh does a Namaste with mock reverence and the hea reciprocates sincerely.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Pehle kyon nahi bataya mahashay? Aapko kandhe pe bitha ke laata yahan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the School, Priya checks the register, Loknath put the indelible ink on the left forefinger of the voter and voters go and randomly press any button. Newton sulks, showing his extreme unhappiness over the proceedings. He squirms every time he hears a “beep” of t EVM and chooses to look away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TV crews are shooting the voters queue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the backdrop of a broken hut, Debbie gives a piece t camera as she walks sideways.

dialogues.speaker: DEBBIE
dialogues.text: This ghost village is a by product of its insurgent past. With most villagers still in camps, a booth has been set up here for just seventy voters from two neighboring villages. Despite such stark contrasts, Democracy truly runs deep in India.  88 89

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slow Motion. The old head man who was in the queue, walks towards Priy and shows her his ID. She looks for his name in her regis and ticks it. Loknath applies ink on the old headman’s forefinger and h walks to the booth. All eyes are on him. He looks nervously at the cameras. He goes to the booth a stands there for a while. Debbie takes a video on her iPh Camera flashes and sun gun lights. Press persons are pois like vultures on a dying prey. Finally, a beep is heard and Newton looks helpless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A) The Zee News reporter interviews some voters who are 8 looking into the camera.

dialogues.speaker: ZEE NEWS REPORTER
dialogues.text: Kissi ne aapko darane ki koshish to nahi ki? The young man whom the question is asked to merely stares into the camera. He shifts his mic to other people who ar the frame. His cameraman says:

dialogues.speaker: CAMERAMAN
dialogues.text: Inhe Hindi kahan aati hai?

dialogues.speaker: ZEE NEWS REPORTER
dialogues.text: Oho... toh ek kaam karo ek accha sa long shot le lo. Baaki main P2C mein dekh loonga. He walks a few pacesr.

dialogues.speaker: ZEE NEWS CAMERAMAN
dialogues.text: Rolling! Huffing and puffing, in his feeble voice, he speaks forcefully as he moves around the school.

dialogues.speaker: ZEE NEWS REPORTER
dialogues.text: Jaise ki aap ne abhi dekha, log nidar ho kar vote dene aaye hai. Dehshat failane walon ko mooh-tod jawab deneka yeh ek hi tareega hai. Aaj Democracy ki jeet hui hai!  71. 89B B) Debbie is gearing to interview Atma Singh. 89B Atma Singh is about to wear his sunglasses when he looks the direction of Verma. Verma has identical pair of sunglasses and they share a moment when they both recogni that fact. Verma wears his sunglasses. Atma Singh sheepis smiles and doesn’t wear his.

dialogues.speaker: DEBBIE
dialogues.text: So Atma Singh, a package of almost $35 million dollars has been given by the center to fight Naxalism. Do you think that’s enough? He has a strange smile plastered on his face. DEBBIE (CONT’D) Please don’t look into the camera, look at me. Debbie waits. Gestures at him to elaborate.

dialogues.speaker: DEBBIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: DEBBIE
dialogues.text: Why is it not enough?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: It is less.

dialogues.speaker: DEBBIE
dialogues.text: Ok. But what do you need?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Better weapons, night vision goggles, thermal imaging, laser range finders.

dialogues.speaker: DEBBIE
dialogues.text: Ok. Thank you. Debbie is creeped out and looks at her cameraman.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Thank you. 89Cc C) IG Verma speaks into a number of mikes thrust at He’s wearing his aviators.

dialogues.speaker: DAINIK JOURNALIST, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Kuch logon ka kehna hai ki iss darr ke mahoul se kewal mining companiyon ko labh hota hai. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: DAINIK JOURNALIST, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Gaon khali karke jungle unko de diya jaega?

dialogues.speaker: VERMA
dialogues.text: Jin logon ka aisa kehna hai woh naxal sympathiser hai. Adhi samasya ji jad wahi hai.

dialogues.speaker: DAINIK JOURNALIST, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Aapki personal rai kya hai iss saare masle par?

dialogues.speaker: VERMA
dialogues.text: Retirement ke baad kitaab mein likhunga. Aap khareed ke padhna! Chalo, thank you. D) Debbie’s cameraman Adam shoots SPOs Lakhma, Joga and t group who pose. Debbie is whispering to him.

dialogues.speaker: DEBBIE
dialogues.text: Gimme children! Gimme children! Krishna and Constable who are standing nearby tease the S

dialogues.speaker: CONSTABLE
dialogues.text: Tum log ab Amrika mey dikhogey!

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Lakhma, mem ki tujhpe hi nazar hai. Le jayegi tujhe apne saath. Lakhma grins.

dialogues.speaker: DEBBIE
dialogues.text: (in Hindi) Haan kyun nahin, tumhe bhi le jaungi. Krishna is embarrassed. E) Constables are teasing the Hindi news cameramen who ar wrapping up.

dialogues.speaker: CONSTABLE 1
dialogues.text: Humara bhi photo kheencho.

dialogues.speaker: CONSTABLE 2
dialogues.text: Yeh TV pe aaega ya cable pe? F) Atma Singh mumbles to Krishna and Rajendra as they wat press persons interviewing a voter.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Baraatiyon ke nikalte hi hamari bhi bidai ho jaegi. Krishna nods.  90 91
90 Verma huddles with Newton and Atma Singh at the door of t school.

dialogues.speaker: VERMA
dialogues.text: Kitna vote gira?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: 70 mein se 39.

dialogues.speaker: VERMA
dialogues.text: Very Good. Hame aur booth dekhne jaana hai. Aapka kya karyakram hai? Kab tak hain yahan?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ji teen baje tak. Abhi toh asli voter... ‘youth’ toh aye nahi hai...

dialogues.speaker: VERMA
dialogues.text: Aayenge bhi nahi.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Par wait to karna hai na sir. Chahe koi na aaye. Agar ek bhi voter reh gaya to fair nahi hoga sir.

dialogues.speaker: VERMA
dialogues.text: Hmmm...

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aapko pata nahin yahan kya kya hua hai-

dialogues.speaker: VERMA
dialogues.text: Kya hua, chunavi dhandli hui? Booth capturing? Naqli vote?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Nahi... Verma looks at Atma Singh.

dialogues.speaker: VERMA
dialogues.text: Then it’s fine.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. HAMLET 2- DAY
dialogues.text: Close up shot of a pot of Chicken Curry being cooked. A female hand adds salt on the top. 91  92 93 94 74.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two young boys (14-15 year olds) carry the clay pot cover with leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A wide shot of the clearing. The press has left. Silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton is fuming at his table. Loknath stretches and yawn

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Election ki raunak alag hi hoti hai. Chalo, apna toh yeh last election tha! Newton glares at him.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Yeh election tha? Koi bhi button daba do! Loknath is taken aback by Newton’s angry retort.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: To hone kyon diya? Rok dete. Aapko pata hai sab procedure se hua hai. Subah se aapki netagiri dekh raha hoon. Inn logon ko civics padha rahe the? Hain?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aap jaayiye! Loknath leaves.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Tees saal naukri mein hamare bhi ho gaye hain, aap jaisa ajooba nahi dekha. Priya stays on. Newton looks at her and gestures, “Do you also want to sa something?”

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Newton sir, aap sab samajhte hai, jaante hai, phir bhi ek baat bolu? Newton stares at her.  95 75.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Humne bhi ek Newton ki kahani suni hai. Humari kahani mein Newton ke sar pe seb girne pe kahi saal lage the. Aur jab seb gira toh uski aankhein khul gayi thi.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Haan haan, woh maine suna hai... point kya hai aapka?

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Sar koi bhi tapasya ek din mein poori nahi hoti. Jungle banne mein saalon lag jaatey hai. Thoda ro lijiye. Mann halka ho jayega. She exits. Shambhu is left alone at his table. He is watching the dr with wide eyes.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ab aap bhi kuch bol ke jaao! Shambhu shakes his head and darts out of the room. Newton is alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the far corner by a broken hut, Dinu is opening a pot chicken that has been covered by leaves. Two teenage Gond boys are with him who have brought the food. The non vegetarian food is for a small clique of Atma Singh’s cro Krishna, Romesh, Lakhma, Loknath who wait patiently for t turn. Atma Singh is wearing his sunglasses. Someone passes salad made of tomatoes and beet.

dialogues.speaker: CONSTABLE
dialogues.text: Laal salaad!

dialogues.speaker: EVERYONE
dialogues.text: Laal salaad! Laal salaad! Loknath is talking to Atma Singh.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Yahan pe jo anyaay ho raha hai isko kaabu mein laane ka solution mere paas hai.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TV. Har ghar mein TV laga do.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Haan TV! Do saal mein sabko Coco Cola aur washing machine ki lat lag jayegi aur kranti bhool kar line pe aa jayenge.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Aap bhi bahut bade gyani nikle.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Kya kare, majboor hai. Suraj na chahte hue bhi prakash baat hi deta hai. Atma Singh picks his plate.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: (referring to the boys) Laundo ne vote diya?

dialogues.speaker: RAJENDRA
dialogues.text: Yeh? Abhi to solah ke bhi nahi hai yeh.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Maine to chaudah saal mein pehli baar vote diya tha. Solah saal mein to hamare jile ke launde chunav lad jaate the.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: (Laughs. Sniffs the pot) Aaye haaye!

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Virender kitna accha bhuna chicken banata tha. Yaad hai? Atma Singh gives Krishna a furious look.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sorry Sir. Loknath is waiting with his plate. Dinu serves generous amounts of the curry. The chicken lo delicious. Rajendra has a sip of mahua from his water bottle. The boys look eagerly for payment.  96 97 98 99 77.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Dinu! Dinu fishes out a 50 Rupee note and gives it to them. It’ too less and they wait for more.

dialogues.speaker: DINU
dialogues.text: (tells them rudely in Gondi to go home ) The boys walk away. Priya sits by herself on a plastic chair and digs a plast fork into green pea pilaf and cold tomato curry. She is observing this. Atma Singh glares at her.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Arre Suno, aa jao. Le lo tum bhi. Krishna ka do mahine pehle beta hua hai. Chutti to de nahi sakta par party to banti hai. Aaja aaja.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Jee main theek hoon. In another corner, the general constabulary are collectin their packed food plate which is cold and vegetarian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton looks defeated. He slumps in his chair and sighs. PBS # 2 plays.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atma Singh and his cronies are enjoying the food.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slow Motion Jib shots of the wind swept jungle. Leaves. D Fog on the hills.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close Up Shots of all the forty-odd men and women who hav voted looking into the camera lens with their index finge stuck out, showing their indelible ink mark. Their expressions are stern almost like they are showing camera “the” finger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Children are playing Chor-Police (Naxal-Police) in the jungle. High speed shots. They have sticks and twigs that look like guns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tight Close Up of Newton. Camera tracks back. He’s sittin a chair expressionless. PBS # 2 ends. Few moments later. Atma Singh comes to the door with a plate of food.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Rule book ke mutabik main andar nahi aa sakta, magar aapko aise dekh kar bura lag raha hai. Newton looks at him. Awkward. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Situation pe na to aapka control hai na hi mera. Hum dono ko to apni duty karni hai. Aap khaana nahi khaenge to mujhe bahut guilty feel hoga. Long silence. Newton looks at Atma Singh when- Gun shots are heard. Atma Singh is alarmed. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Aap yahan se hilna mat. He rushes out. More Gunshots. Atma Singh is shouting instructions. Newton tries to rush out when Priya and Lok rush into the school followed by an armed constable.

dialogues.speaker: CONSTABLE 1
dialogues.text: Bahar mat ayiye! Ambush ho gaya hai! They all huddle in one corner. Suddenly Atma Singh carrying his AK-47 reappears with SPO Lakhma.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Aap log apna saman sameto aur niklo. Priya and Loknath start wrapping up.  101 102 103 79. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Newton sir aap theek ho? Ghabrane ki koi baat nahi hai. Lakhma aur Krishna ek team lekar aapke saath highway tak jayenge. Wahan se hamari jeeps aapko le jayengi. Raaste mein Priya ko unke gaon chhod denge. Newton responds well to the situation. He hesitates for a moment and puts the control unit and balloting unit into bag and rushes out. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Jaldi kare! Atma Singh is facing Newton. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Alvida Newton babu. Dua mein yaad rakhna. Newton feels sentimental. The men share a moment. He hold Atma Singh’s hands. Atma Singh nods and rushes out.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Jaldi chalo. Newton, Priya and Loknath rush out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As soon as they come out:

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Mere peeche peeche aao. Jaldi. Krishna is a hundred meters away with a band of ten armed SPOs/constables. He gestures them to rush. They all begin run. Gunshots are heard sporadically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton, Priya, Loknath, Shambhu, Krishna, Lakhma and othe run down the path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they descend from the slope, they have slowed down and firing has stopped. Newton walks by himself, thoughtful.  80. Priya, Lakhma, Shambhu are walking behind him. Krishna is walking a bit ahead with Loknath and two constables. They are followed by two. (Loknath is telling some story we cannot hear). They stop at a point from where a path cuts to the left a leads into the thicket.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Aap to chali jayengi yahan se.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Jee. (to Newton) Accha sir. Dhanyawaad.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Akele kaise jayengi yeh? Attack hua hai.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Main chali jaungi.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Nahi nahi aise kaise?

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Inko kuch nahi hoga... agar aap kaho toh kisiko-

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Nahi nahi... main chali jaungi. (to Newton) Kabhi iss taraf aana hua toh mil lijiyega. Maspur gaon hai mera. Newton smiles. Krishna and Lakhma look on, naughtily.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Priyaji kalam to leti jaiye baccho ko sher kaise banayengi? Handing the pen to her, Loknath finds the card in his poc LOKNATH (CONT’D) Ah Lo! Newton babu ke patte khul gaye.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Kaun sa hai? Duggi Joker to tha ab kya hai? Loknath shows it- 5. He looks at Newton who’s disinterest  104 81.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Paanch. Kuch kaam ka nahi hai. Ikka baadshah begum hoti to maza aata.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA
dialogues.text: Nahin Sir, yeh hota hai paanch. She shows him her hand and makes it into a fist.

dialogues.speaker: PRIYA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (tapping her temple) Aur yeh hota hai chhe. Newton absorbs it but doesn’t acknowledge.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Chhati indri ki baat kar rahi hai Sir. Sixth sense. Priya smiles and walks away. She walks into the distance and disappears into the thick without ever turning back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton walks with the group. They resume walking. He is feeling uneasy. After walking a few meters. Lakhma is talking about a Sal Khan film to Krishna. Newton listens to them and starts thinking.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Loknath ji, aapko filmein dekhna pasand hai na?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Ji.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aap agar wapis jaakar aaj ki kahani kisiko sunaogey toh aapko nahin lagta woh bada khush hoga, woh kahega ‘arre wah, iss kahani mein toh sab kuch hai- shuru mein kuch hota hi nahin hai aur aakhir mein goliyan chalne lagti hai.’ Kyun? Loknath nods and laughs. Krishna and Lakhma silently list to Newton.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yeh bahut badiya kissa nahi hua humare saath? Ab kissa kahan hota hai, Loknath ji? Kissa hota hai theater mein, parde pe. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Subah se shanti thi, jaise hi voting khatam hua, achanak se twist aa gaya.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Sir ji, kya bol rahe ho aap?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Atma Singh ko bata do ki kalaai khul gaya hai. Newton turns and walks back.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Sir, aap aise jaa nahi sakte. Newton ignores him and keeps walking.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sir! Aise mat jaiye. Newton keeps walking briskly. Krishna and others walk beh him. Loknath, Shambhu and a constable stay back. Krishna talks on the walkie.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tango calling cheetah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atma Singh and his platoon of constables are walking thro the jungle. Rajendra passes him a walkie.

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Janab, lagta hai yeh Newton ji wapas booth jaa raha hai.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Huh? Kya bak rahe ho?

dialogues.speaker: KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Ruk nahi rahe hai. Lagta hai inko pata chal gaya hai...

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: (scolds) Useless hai sab ke sab. Ek kaam theek se nahi kar sakte. Pakdo usse!  106 107 108 109 83.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they walk back, Krishna and Lakhma try to reason with Newton in their own way.

dialogues.speaker: LAKHMA
dialogues.text: Sir, kyun humare naukri ko khatre mein daal rahe ho. Krishna and Lakhma run behind him. Newton begins to run w the EVM in his hand. It soon turns into a CHASE, Newton has a good lead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton runs ahead. From the distance, he sees Atma Singh his troops coming downhill- around 200 meters away. Newton freezes for a second.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Pakdo usse! The men run downhill towards Newton. Behind him, Krishna Lakhma are waiting with some constables. Newton turns in the third direction and runs towards the jungle. The men chase him. 30 men run behind Newton. In a wide shot- we see Newton running towards the deep forest full of Sal trees. The me follow him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton runs into the Sal forest with the men following hi Finally after a formidable chase, he is nabbed by Rajendr and another constable. Scolding him, they drag him out of the forest towards the Barren Jungle Path. Newton is completely exhausted, he is holding the EVM tig A constable grabs it from his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newton is brought to Atma Singh and his cronies who wait.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aap logon ne fraud kiya hai! Atma Singh comes close to Newton. Looks him in the eye.  110 111 84.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Bahar mat bolna. Log hasenge. Chaliye chalte hain.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Main sab likhoonga apne report mein.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Likho! Kaun gawahi dega? They walk towards the bushy jungle path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loknath, Shambhu and a couple of constables are waiting f them. As soon as they see Atma Singh and his platoon brin Newton- dragging him by his arms, they stand up, shocked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all walk down the path- silently. In the distance, the four Gondi youth who they encountere the morning are seen, coming back with baskets full of te leaves. They stop and raise their ID cards.

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG MAN 1
dialogues.text: Vote dena?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Kya vote? Bhaggg! The young Adivasis turn and walk away.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Ruko!!! Ruko!!! They stop and look back. Newton tries to free himself. They violently pin him down the scuffle that ensues, Newton pounces on Romesh and gra his gun. He points the gun at Atma Singh. Shock.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Mental jaisi harkat mat karo Newton. Naukri kharab ho jaegi.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sab bandooke neeche karo.  85. All guns are pointing at Newton. Everyone is talking SIMULTANEOUSLY.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Trigger se ungli hatao!

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Newton sir!!!

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Bandook neeche. Unko yahan bulao!

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Bandook neeche. His men obey him.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Koi chalaki nahi! Unko bulao yahan!

dialogues.speaker: ATMARAM KRISHNA
dialogues.text: Newton babu hosh mein aa (calls the tribal youth) jao...Sab neeche rakh do bhai Aao bhai... aao! bandook. Batcheet se sab hal ho sakta hai. Dekhiye hamari aapki koi personal dushmani thodi hai.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Aao bhailog!! The Gondis come with their hands up.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Aap log haath neeche... Shambhu wahan machine lagao! Shambhu is so nervous, he’s shaking and does as told. Atma Singh is in reconciliatory mode.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Accha kara lo chunav bas. Bandook idhar de do please. Chal gayi musibaat aa jeagi. Aap samajh nahi rahe ho.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: (screams ) Haath upar mooh band. The Gondi youth turn to run away.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tum nahi. Tum yahan aao. Dinu! Bolo inhe.  86. Dinu tells them to stop in Gondi and tells them to vote.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jaldi aao! Loknath, ID check karo aur voting karao.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Sir aap jaante ho na aap kya kar rahe ho? Newton gives him a look, Loknath does as he is told. He s up the polling booth behind a bush.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Election officer ke haath mein bandook shobha nahi deti. Newton ignores them, Shambhu is checking their cards, mar the names in the book and getting them to put their thumb impressions. Atma Singh and his men look at Newton. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Aagya ho main baith jaaun?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Bandook se door. He sits.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kyon ki nakli firing?

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Aap seedhe seedhe maan kaha rahe the? Subah se bol raha hoon ilaka safe nahi hai. Do saal se night vision googles maang rahe hai...Bahadur ladke faltu mein marte hai accha nahi lagta. Aapke election picnic ke chakkar mein main apne aadmiyon ki jaan jokham mein nahi daal sakta.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Justify karne ki koshish mat kijiye. Loknath! Newton signals him to start. Loknath talks to a voter as he applies indelible ink on t voter’s forefinger.

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Kisko vote doge?  87. The young man stares at Loknath and presses his button by covering the EVM with his body. The man knows whom to vot for. The first beep of the voting machine is heard. Newton’s brow is beaded with sweat. Atma Singh looks like a miffed school boy sitting in one corner. Another beep is heard. One of the voters steals a glance at Atma Singh who glare back at him. The voter lowers his eyes and goes to vote. Another beep is heard. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Sir, aapka sign chahiye.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Sab theek se hua?

dialogues.speaker: LOKNATH
dialogues.text: Jee.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Kya time hua?

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Paanch minute hai. Ruk jao. SILENCE FOR FIVE MINUTES AS EVERYONE WAITS. Mid shots and Close ups of all characters. THE WATCH HITS THREE. AND... Newton signs on the paper. Loknath brings him the EVM. Ne switches off the button. Big beep.

dialogues.speaker: ATMA SINGH
dialogues.text: Ho gaya? Newton nods. Atma Singh is assisted to get up by Krishna. He brushes h pants and stands up.

dialogues.speaker: NEWTON
dialogues.text: Mujhe pata hai aap arrest karoge. Kar lo. Newton keeps the gun on the ground.  112 113 114 115 88. As soon as he does that- ALL THE MEN POUNCE ON NEWTON. FR FRAME. FADE TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over shots of Iron Ore mining. SUPER: “Six Months Later”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Banner on the stage reads “EKTA MANCH- a forum for democracy”. A middle aged woman is reading out from a pap

dialogues.speaker: EMCEE
dialogues.text: Aap Dandkaranya jungle mein election duty par the jahan achanak naxali hamla ho gaya. Chunav ko prajatantra ka sabse prabhavshaali chinh maante hue aapne naxaliyon ke hamle ka mooh tod jawab diya. Gaur talab hai ki hamle ke waqt chunav adhikari ka mansik santulan bigad gaya aur veh mat daan machine lekar jungle me bhaag gaye. Atma Singh ne soojbhooj aur bahaduri ka praman dete hue na sirf uss chunav adhikari aur matdaan machine ko surakshit vapas pahuchaya balki chaar khatarnaak naxaliyon ko bhi aatma samarpan karne ke liye vivash kar diya. Assistant Commandent Atma Singh ko yeh puraskar dene ke liye main swatantra senani Radhyeshyam ji ko maanch par aamantratit karna chahungi. Atma Singh walks to the stage and accepts an award from a year old man. Audience claps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little boy of 8 rushes out of his hut. He is carrying a slate. He runs into the woods. He sits sext to some child who have gathered. We reveal that Newton is teaching chil who were seen in the Chor-Police sequence. A little away, Priya is teaching kids.
